data.title: AMI Montessori Digital Library
data.text:
The NAMTA Journal Collection Listing

The NAMTA Board has contributed the entire collection of The NAMTA Journal to be housed in the AMI Montessori Digital Library, in order to have this valuable resource be publicly available, in perpetuity, according to best practice archival, discoverability and open access standards.

All journals and all individual articles are available for viewing, searching and downloading. Metadata can be downloaded in all major standards and the collection has additionally been enriched with the data catalogued in ERIC.
